about_the_game:
This time the competition gets really animated! The most beloved heroes of the Looney Tunes™ world are ready to hit the track! With the new exclusive expansion, you will be able to drive the legendary Bugs Bunny™ and Daffy Duck™, aim for victory with the explosive Marvin the Martian™ and finally discover who is really the fastest between Wile E. Coyote™ and Road Runner™. And that's not all, folks! Build fun tracks in a completely new environment, the Looney Tunes Adventure Park, where you can relive the hilarious adventures of the classic animated series. Looney Tunes Adventure Park is a theme park divided into 4 areas, including the iconic desert set of Wile E. Coyote™'s epic fails. Will he redeem himself this time? It’s all on you and your ability to avoid the rockets launched by the new Looney Tunes: ACME Rockets module. And as always, new elements to customize your Basement and Unleashed profile!

This DLC includes:
  • 1 Environment to race and build your tracks: Looney Tunes Adventure Park
  • 5 Vehicles: Bugs Bunny™, Daffy Duck™, Marvin the Martian™, Wile E. Coyote™, Road Runner™
  • 1 Themed Customization Pack for your Basement: 3 wall, 2 floors, 1 door, 2 decorations, 1 couch, 1 poster and 1 set of 4 posters; for your Unleashed Profile: 2 icons, 2 tags and 2 backgrounds
  • 1 Track Builder Module: Looney Tunes: ACME Rockets

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: This time the competition gets really animated! The most beloved Looney Tunes™ heroes hit the track! And that's not all, folks! Have fun with a new environment, the ACME Rockets module and custom elements for your Basement and Unleashed profile!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
